recipesJson.name: STEAL THIS RECIPE TOO
recipesJson.author: Vurve
recipesJson.description:
Inspired by CheebaSteeba's Mango Lassi, I sought out to create with a more creamy base and a more playful mango. Just in time to beat the summer heat. 

The FLV cream and vanilla swirl create a more milk shake style cream base. 

Without a doubt, the best two mangos for this are FLV and CAP. They are light, fresh, and sweet. FA pear provides a bit more fruit body and wetness to the mouth feel. Lastly, CAP sweet strawberry helps to blend the mango into the cream while providing additional sweetness and balancing the overall fruit profile. 

Makes for a perfect shake and vape while the mango is fresh.

reviews.text: Man I just love good mango recipes and this is good. I did change the name in my private recipes to "mango lassi (vurve)"
Mixed up a 15ml to test at first and vaped it all in a matter of hours! I will definitely keep this in rotation for a while! Thx Vurve!
This recipe is even better with half of a drop of brie cheese per gallon!
